SEARCH
程序包 com.hsmkmathlib.matrix

类 Matrix

java.lang.Object
com.hsmkmathlib.matrix.Matrix
public final class Matrix extends Object
A class representing a matrix with double precision values.

This class provides functionality for:

  • Matrix creation and initialization
  • Basic matrix operations (addition, subtraction, multiplication)
  • Element-wise operations
  • Matrix properties (square, symmetric, diagonal)
  • Matrix transposition
  • Accessing rows, columns, and individual elements

  • 构造器概要

    Creates a new matrix with specified dimensions.
    Matrix(Matrix other)
    Creates a new matrix as a copy of another matrix.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Matrix

      public Matrix(int rows, int cols)
      Creates a new matrix with specified dimensions.
      参数:
      rows - the number of rows
      cols - the number of columns
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if rows or cols are not positive

    • Matrix

      public Matrix(double[][] data)
      Creates a new matrix from a 2D array of doubles.
      参数:
      data - the 2D array containing matrix elements
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if data is null or contains null rows

    • Matrix

      public Matrix(double[][] data, boolean isCopy)
      Creates a new matrix from a 2D array of doubles with option to copy data.
      参数:
      data - the 2D array containing matrix elements
      isCopy - if true, creates a deep copy of the data; if false, uses the provided array directly
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if data is null or contains null rows

    • Matrix

      public Matrix(Matrix other)
      Creates a new matrix as a copy of another matrix.
      参数:
      other - the matrix to copy
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if other is null or contains invalid data

      public boolean isSameSize(Matrix other)
      Checks if the matrix has the same dimensions as another matrix.
      参数:

      返回:
      true if the matrices have the same dimensions, false otherwise

      IllegalArgumentException - if any index is out of bounds
